definitions.definition: A house or shelter for a dog.
A facility at which dogs are reared or boarded.
definitions.example: She raises registered Dalmatians at her kennel.

definitions.definition: (collective) The dogs kept at such a facility; a pack of hounds.
The hole of a fox or other animal.
To house or board a dog (or less commonly another animal).
definitions.example: While we're away our friends will kennel our pet poodle.

definitions.definition: To lie or lodge; to dwell, as a dog or a fox.
To drive (a fox) to covert in its hole.
The gutter at the edge of a street; a surface drain.
